text:
COMPLIANCE TOWARDS DISEASE PREVENTION TECHNIQUES DURING THE COVID-19 PANDEMIC

Please read the statements below and for each select the response that best reflects your opinion. There are no right or wrong answers.

Key:
1=Strongly disagree
2=Disagree
3=Slightly disagree
4=Neither agree nor disagree
5=Slightly agree
6=Agree
7=Strongly agree
I would meet up with friends inside without a face mask on or any other prevention measures.
When shopping, I follow the one-way system and 2 metre rules even though it takes longer.
I always use the hand sanitiser stations in public, or my own, when in public.
I would break the rules to meet up with friends or family.
If I see people meeting illegally, I will report them.
If told to quarantine for two weeks, I would comply (e.g., track and trace or travel).
